content.webTitle: Manchester United v Brighton: match preview

fields.headline: Manchester United v Brighton: match preview
fields.bodyText: Manchester United are again looking up following the league defeat last time out at Bournemouth after Europa League knockout qualification was secured on Thursday with two group games left. Brandon Williams could make his full debut at left-back as Ole Gunnar Solskjær’s team look for a repeat of last season’s win, though Brighton arrive with two more points than United. Jamie Jackson Sunday 2pm Venue Old Trafford Last season Manchester United 2 Brighton 1 Referee Jon Moss This season G8 Y28 R2 3.75 cards/game Odds H 11-17 A 6-1 D 29-10 MANCHESTER UNITED Subs from Romero, Grant, Chong, Mata, Garner, Lingard, Lindelöf, Greenwood Doubtful Lindelöf (back), McTominay (knock) Injured Dalot (hip), Matic (knock), Shaw (thigh), Tuanzebe (hip, all Dec), Bailly (knee, Jan), Fosu-Mensah (knee), Pogba (ankle, both unknown) Suspended Young (one match) Discipline Y24 R0 Form LDLDWL Leading scorer Rashford 5 BRIGHTON Subs from Button, Steele, Bong, Gross, Balogun, Richards, Murray, Mooy, Jahanbakhsh, March, Baluta, Schelotto Doubtful None Injured Bernardo (knee, 23 Nov), Izquierdo (knee, unknown), Webster (ankle, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y13 R2 Form DLWLWW Leading scorer Maupay 4
